Updates.Changelog: Fix installing of Quest apps, some other minor bug fixes and using of my ComputerUtils lib for some stuff
Yes, you can now downgrade quest with rift downgrader (advantages over online site: automatic install which works for the most part, easier version and app management). I also improved logging
Unhandled exceptions now get logged and new lines have the right line start instead of just continuing with the message. Oculus folder path now gets checked before setting.
Correction of oculus software folder, logging, code cleanup, add proper validating of game files, ...
Apps now get copied to the oculus directory before launchin so the entitlement check doesn't fail. I also implemented automativ updating.
